title: Boards for our Volunteer's.
body:
I got this idea, as there is always some issue of:

Technical difficulties-
Asking for advice-
Where/what do I do if X-
etc.

----------------------------

So i thought, we have guys dedicated to this, Why not have boards that are dedicated to this.
Like a Engineer boards (I forgot what they are called)
If someone has a tech issue or question they can ask there.

If someone would like coaching, or seeking advise, they can post on the Instructor boards.

Emissary etc.

------------------------------

What do people think about this?

replies.body:
Good idea, but it's sort of what we do already.

Help and support - Wrenchman
Player behaviour - emissary
Gameplay & strategy - instructor 

Of course sometimes there is overlap, but the boards are usually dead or the questions are the same ones over and over again so we get each other to answer sometime XD

Anything that helps people find what their looking for can't be bad. Just gotta make it clear to people what issue goes where so they don't waste their time posting and you waste you're time answering and they get it right in the first place.
We already got help & support section for the people .
I think it's a great idea. Alot of the same questions seem to be asked and get lost among all the other posts on the boards.
